dialogue.speaker: Protagonist (Alex Chen)
dialogue.text: Welcome to Haven Springs! I'm Alex Chen, and this is my home now.

dialogue.speaker: Ryan Lucero
dialogue.text: Hey Alex, what's up? How was the drive from California?

dialogue.speaker: Protagonist (Alex Chen)
dialogue.text: It was long. I'm just glad to be here and start my new life.

dialogue.speaker: Ryan Lucero
dialogue.text: Aww, don't be down! You'll love it here. We're gonna have some fun times!

dialogue.speaker: Narration
dialogue.text: As I walked through the streets of Haven Springs, I couldn't help but feel a mix of emotions. Excitement for this new chapter in my life, but also nervousness about what lay ahead.
